text: Arthur E. Orloff (1908–1994) was an American screenwriter.Pitts p.437 ==Selected filmography== * Alias Mr. Twilight (1946) * Wild Country (1947) * The Lone Wolf in London (1947) * Cheyenne Takes Over (1947) * Code of the Silver Sage (1950) * Beauty on Parade (1950) * Thunder in God's Country (1951) * Buckaroo Sheriff of Texas (1951) * Desperadoes' Outpost (1952) * Red River Shore (1953) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Pitts, Michael R. Western Movies: A Guide to 5,105 Feature Films. McFarland, 2012. ==External links== * Category:1908 births Category:1994 deaths Category:People from Brooklyn Category:20th-century American screenwriters
title: Arthur E. Orloff
